iti105:0.3: The Chapter on the Holy Offering of the Teaching
iti105:1.1: This was said by the Buddha, the Perfected One: that is what I heard.
iti105:2.1: “Mendicants, there are four things that give rise to craving in a mendicant.
iti105:2.6: or rebirth in this or that state.
iti105:2.7: These are the four things that give rise to craving in a mendicant.”
iti105:2.8: That is what the Buddha said.
iti105:3.2: as they transmigrate on this long journey.
iti105:3.3: They go from this state to another,
iti105:4.2: that craving is the cause of suffering—
iti105:4.3: rid of craving, free of grasping,
iti105:4.4: a mendicant would go forth mindfully.”
iti105:5.1: This too was spoken by the Blessed One: that is what I heard.
